description: Phase 3 requires both SUMO toolchain (Phase 1) and UAV ontology (Phase 2). It produces the translation pipeline needed for execution mode.

phase-01-ontology-toolchain.reason: Requires SUMO to validate translation correctness

phase-02-uav-ontology.reason: Translates the UAV ontology from KIF to Prolog

parallel_execution.notes: Depends on Phase 1 and 2 completion. Blocks execution mode development.
